name: Dekagon
description:
ANDROID GAME

This is NOT PUZZLE GAME... This is a GREAT LOGIC GAME.

-This game aims to encourage your thinking ...
-The goal of this game is to arrange the numbers from zero to ten
in the correct order...
-It's not as easy as it seems.

-The number, which you want to move just touch with finger ...
If possible , the number will move to free (empty ) location
And if this is not possible , you will hear a tone that will draw your attention
that number does not have any position to go.

-The game has no points, no timing ... No Enemy.
-This is just for your entertainment, and thinking ...

ZmajSoft Team
